ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.9 on 2024-07-27T21:43:58 [Issue ID 4000-467749] urn:comicvine:4000-467749
ComicInfo.Summary:
With Prog 1902, the Galaxy’s Greatest Comic continues its universe-shattering line-up specially designed for new and lapsed readers with Judge Dredd: Block Judge by John Wagner and Carlos Ezquerra, Kingdom: Aux Drift by Dan Abnett, Richard Elson and Abigail Ryder, Stickleback: The Thru’Penny Opera by Ian Edginton and D'Israeli, The Grievous Journey of Ichabod Azrael (And The Dead Left In His Wake) by Rob Williams and Mike Dowling, and Greysuit by Pat Mills, John Higgins and Sally Hurst.
Cover: Richard Elson
Judge Dredd - Block Judge (Part Three) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra)Stickleback - The Thru'Penny Opera (Part Three) (Ian Edginton - D'Israeli)Greysuit - Prince of Darkness (Part Two) (Pat Mills - John Higgins)The Grievous Journey of Ichabod Azrael (And the Dead Left In His Wake) - One Last Bullet (Part Two) (Rob Williams - Michael Dowling)Kingdom - Aux Drift (Part Three) (Dan Abnett - Richard Elson)
ComicInfo.Title: Prog 1902
ComicInfo.Writer: Dan Abnett,Ian Edginton,John Wagner,Pat Mills,Rob Williams
